title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2821/94 of 21 November 1994 re-establishing the levying of customs duties and ending the charges against tariff ceilings opened in 1994, on certain textile products originating in Indonesia, India, Thailand, Pakistan and South Korea, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2821/94 of 21 November 1994 re-establishing the levying of customs duties and ending the charges against tariff ceilings opened in 1994, on certain textile products originating in Indonesia, India, Thailand, Pakistan  and South Korea, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3832/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 25 November 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 November 1994.
For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 39.
(2) OJ No L 338, 31. 12. 1993, p. 22.
